explains: adj. （因非常富有或社会地位高而）享有特权的；荣幸的；（信息）得到特许保密的
v. 特免，免除（某人）；<正式>授予……以特权；给予特权，特别优待（privilege 的过去分词形式）
wordGroup: privileged position 特权地位；最优惠头寸

sentences.en: She comes from a privileged background.
Those in authority were in a privileged position.
They are only interested in preserving the power of the privileged and the well off.
sentences.cn: 他们只对保护特权阶层和富人的权力感兴趣。
